title: Typewritten introduction to Dialectics of Isolation: Third World Women Artists of the United States
description: A typewritten introduction by Ana Mendieta introducing Dialectics of Isolation: An Exhibition of Third World Women Artists, an A.I.R. exhibition from 1980. The exhibition was curated by Mendieta and Kazuko and Zarina Hashimi.
creator: Ana Mendieta; Artists in Residence (A.I.R.) Gallery
subject: Mendieta, Ana, 1948-1985; Feminism in art
rights: In Copyright. Digitized as part of a partnership between A.I.R. Gallery and The Feminist Institute, 2022.

title: Installation view 1: Ana Mendieta: A Retrospective, New Museum, New York, 1987
description: 35mm slide photograph taken at Ana Mendieta: A Retrospective by Fred Scruton. An installation view of several works by Mendieta, including sculptures and large drawings.
creator: Fred Scruton; The New Museum of Contemporary Art
subject: Mendieta, Ana, 1948-1985; Installations (Art)--United States--Exhibitions; Feminism in art

title: Works from the Silueta Series, 1973-80
description: 35mm slide photograph taken at Ana Mendieta: A Retrospective by Fred Scruton. Features eight color photographs of several works in Mendieta's Silueta Series (1973-80), on display at the New Museum in 1987.
creator: Fred Scruton; The New Museum of Contemporary Art
subject: Mendieta, Ana, 1948-1985; Installations (Art)--United States--Exhibitions; Feminism in art

title: Rites and Rituals of Initiation (Ritos y rituales de iniciación), 1978
description: 35mm slide photograph taken at Ana Mendieta: A Retrospective by Fred Scruton. Features sculptures and two-dimensional works from Rites and Rituals of Initiation (Ritos y rituales de iniciación) (1978), on display at the New Museum in 1987.
creator: Fred Scruton; The New Museum of Contemporary Art
subject: Mendieta, Ana, 1948-1985; Installations (Art)--United States--Exhibitions; Feminism in art

title: Body Tracks (Rastros corporales), 1982
description: 35mm slide photograph taken at Ana Mendieta: A Retrospective by Fred Scruton. Features two-dimensional painted works in color from Body Tracks (Rastros corporales) (1982), on display at the New Museum in 1987.
creator: Fred Scruton; The New Museum of Contemporary Art
subject: Mendieta, Ana, 1948-1985; Installations (Art)--United States--Exhibitions; Feminism in art
